block.minecraft.vault.howto: Right click with a trial key to obtain loot.
block.minecraft.vault.ominous_howto: Right click with an OMINOUS trial key to obtain loot.
block.minecraft.vault.howto_innate: Vault is on cooldown. Come back later with a trial key
block.minecraft.vault.ominous_howto_inna: Vault is on cooldown. Come back later with an OMINOUS trial key
block.minecraft.respawn_anchor.howto: Right click with glowstone to charge.
block.minecraft.trial_spawner.howto: The trial spawner will spawn mobs after a set cooldown. Defeat waves to receive rewards.
block.minecraft.trial_spawner.active: The Trial Spawner is spawning mobs
block.minecraft.trial_spawner.inactive: The Trial Spawner is currently inactive
block.minecraft.trial_spawner.oncooldown: The Trial Spawner is on cooldown
block.minecraft.trial_spawner.ejecting_r: The Trial Spawner is ejecting a reward
block.minecraft.trial_spawner.waiting_fo: The Trial Spawner is waiting to eject a reward
block.minecraft.composter.howto: Right click with plant materials to turn them into bonemeal
block.minecraft.campfire.howto: Right click with food to cook it
block.minecraft.cauldron.howto: Right click with a fluid bucket to fill or empty the cauldron
block.minecraft.susblock.howto: Brush the block carefully with a brush to obtain rewards
block.minecraft.redstone_lamp.howto: This block emits light when powered
block.minecraft.copper_bulb.howto: This block switches between a lit and unlit state when powered
block.minecraft.lectern.howto: Right click with a written book to display and read it
block.minecraft.lightning_rod.howto: This block attracts lightning during a thunderstorm
block.minecraft.piston.howto: Power this block to push other blocks
block.minecraft.sticky_piston.howto: Power this block to push and pull other blocks
block.minecraft.decorated_pot.howto: This block can hold up to one stack of any item
block.minecraft.end_portal_frame.howto: Right click this block with an eye of ender to fill it.
block.minecraft.chiseled_bookshelf.howto: Books can be placed into and retrieved from this block
item.minecraft.carrot_on_a_stick.howto: Pigs can be controlled with this item when ridden
Striders can be controlled with this item when ridden
item.minecraft.trident.howto: This weapon can be thrown and retrieved. If enchanted with Loyalty, it will return to the thrower
item.minecraft.lead.howto: Right click on entities to attach them to you
item.minecraft.mace.howto: This weapon deals more damage the further the user has fallen
item.minecraft.trial_key.howto: This can be used to retrieve loot from a normal vault
item.minecraft.goat_horn.howto: Right click to play a sound
item.minecraft.name_tag.howto: Rename this item in an anvil then right click on an entity to name the entity
item.minecraft.brush.howto: Right click suspicious blocks to obtain items from them
item.minecraft.clock.howto: This item tells you what time of day it is
item.minecraft.spyglass.howto: Right click to zoom in on something in the distance
item.minecraft.ominous_trial_key.howto: This can be used to retrieve loot from an Ominous Vault
item.minecraft.music_discs.howto: Insert a disc into a jukebox to play it
item.minecraft.ender_eye.howto: Right click to throw, and the eye will fly towards the stronghold
item.minecraft.saddle.howto: Place this on certain mobs to ride them
item.minecraft.elytra.howto: When this is worn in the chestplate slot, the wearer is able to glide
item.minecraft.wind_charge.howto: Right click to throw as a weapon, or right click at the ground to jump extra high
item.minecraft.ender_pearl.howto: Throw at blocks to teleport to them.
item.minecraft.map.howto: Right click to create a filled map of the surrounding area
item.minecraft.compass.howto: This item points to the world spawmpoint.
item.minecraft.recovery_compass.howto: This item points towards your most recent death coords.
item.minecraft.totem_of_undying.howto: When held in mainhand or offhand, this item will save you from dying
